body.p: The controversy relating to internally generated intangible assets surrounds whether there should be:

li.p: a requirement to recognise internally generated intangible assets in the balance sheet whenever certain criteria are met;
a requirement to recognise expenditure on all internally generated intangible assets as an expense;
a requirement to recognise expenditure on all internally generated intangible assets as an expense, with certain specified exceptions; or
an option to choose between the treatments described in (a) and (b) above.
